projects.title: GPS
projects.description: This is state-of-the-art GPS live navigation application designed to provide users with a seamless and feature-rich experience for all their location-related needs

projects.title: Document Scanner
projects.description: Comprehensive document scanner that leverages cutting-edge technologies and libraries such as Hilt, Room DB, OpenCV, and CamView to provide a robust and efficient solution for scanning

projects.title: Advance Calculators
projects.description: This is a versatile calculator application that goes above and beyond the basics.

projects.title: Music Player
projects.description: This is a versatile and powerful platform for music enthusiasts. Built using Hilt for dependency injection and featuring a wide array of functionalities, including different themes, services, playlist management
